arts.ttl: Gladbach’s Tim Kleindienst in fine goalscoring form
arts.sum: Tim Kleindienst scored Borussia Mönchengladbach’s second as Gerardo Seoane’s side beat Union Berlin 2-1 to move die Fohlen to within three points of fourth placed RB Leipzig. The German’s 14th…

arts.ttl: Gladbach hold on to secure thrilling 2-1 away victory over Union Berlin
arts.sum: In the 10th minute, Lukas Ullrich found the back of the net with a powerful finish, assisted by Robin Hack, to give the visitors the lead. Hosts Union Berlin got back into the game from the penalty spot, but were unable to find an equaliser late on as the Foals secured victory at the Alte Försterei.

arts.ttl: Union Berlin vs Borussia Mönchengladbach preview: Hosts look to build momentum
arts.sum: Union Berlin take on Borussia Mönchengladbach on home soil as they aim to build on a 4-0 win against Hoffenheim last time out.

arts.ttl: Preview: Union Berlin vs. Borussia Monchengladbach - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Union Berlin and Borussia Monchengladbach, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
